title: Spacious 2 bedroom coming available in August!
posting_body: ['**Available to view & move-in on August 15th***', 'Located in the heart of beautiful Parma, Ohio, surrounded by a serene wooded area, Ridgewood House Apartments is now offering this Spacious 2-bedroom suite $1,065.00 per month.', '12 month lease.', '• Water $25.00 for the first person + $5.00/per each additional occupant', '• Gas Capped at $59.00', '• Trash $5.00', '• Central heating and Air conditioning', '• Plentiful electrical outlets', '• HUGE closets/including walk in', '• Spacious Kitchen', '• Garbage disposal', '• Open spacious floor plans', '• Wall to wall carpet', '• Individual thermostat', '• Exhaust fan in Bathroom', '• Ceiling fan in dinette area', 'Community features:', '• On-site 24 hour Emergency Maintenance', '• 24 hour Fitness Center', '• Heated indoor pool all year round', '• Four lot parking and guest parking', '• Secured package area', '• Picnic area with grills', '• Sundeck with lounge chairs and picnic tables', '• Remodeled party room', '• On-site management', '• Two separate elevators', '• Social & Community Events', '• 24 hour Laundry facility', '• On site discounted yoga classes available', '• Very close to tons of local shopping and restaurants', '• Community Vegetable Garden', '• Dog park', 'Pet Policy: (2 PETS MAX ALLOWED)', 'We follow the City of Parma Breed Restrictions', 'Dogs:', 'All dogs must be under 35 lbs at full grown', 'At least 12 month old', 'Spayed/Neutered', 'Up to date on all shots', 'Dog license required', 'House Broken.', 'Cats:', 'Spayed/Neutered', 'Up to date on all shots', 'At least 6 months old', 'Litter trained.']
